title: Hate Speech
description: This dataset contains 24783 tweets which have been categorized into three classes: offensive language, hate speech, and neither. The task is to accurate categorize each tweet into the correct class. Caution: The data contains content that is racist, sexist, homophobic, and offensive in many ways.
